content.rendered:
Any personal information you provide to Dan Gilroy Design including and similar to your name, address, telephone number and e-mail address will not be released, sold, or rented to any entities or individuals outside of Dan Gilroy Design, LLC.

External Sites

Dan Gilroy Design, LLC is not responsible for the content of external internet sites. You are advised to read the privacy policy of external sites before disclosing any personal information.

Remember The Risks Whenever You Use The Internet

While Dan Gilroy Design does its best to protect your personal information, it cannot guarantee the security of any information that you transmit to Dan Gilroy Design, LLC and you are solely responsible for maintaining the secrecy of any passwords or other account information. In addition, other Internet sites or services that may be accessible through Dan Gilroy Design, LLC have separate data and privacy practices independent of us, and therefore we disclaim any responsibility or liability for their policies or actions.

Please contact those vendors and others directly if you have any questions about their privacy policies.
